languages.text: Псайкеры погибают в попытке постичь угрозу, но последний из колдунов успевает передать сообщение: "Дар принят. Ответные дары в пути", после чего несчастного выворачивает внутренностями наружу. Вслед за инцидентом по всему протекторату наблюдают рост числа латентных псайкеров и варп-манифестации.

The psykers perish in their attempts to comprehend this menace, but the last of them manages to deliver a message before he is turned inside out: "The offering is accepted and reciprocated." Following the incident, an increase in the number of latent psykers and warp manifestations is observed across the protectorate.
languages.original_text: Псайкеры погибают в попытке постичь угрозу, но последний из колдунов успевает передать сообщение: "Дар принят. Ответные дары в пути", после чего несчастного выворачивает внутренностями наружу. Вслед за инцидентом по всему протекторату наблюдают рост числа латентных псайкеров и варп-манифестации.

traits.locale_text: The psykers perish in their attempts to comprehend this menace, but the last of them manages to deliver a message before he is turned inside out: "The offering is accepted and reciprocated." Following the incident, an increase in the number of latent psykers and warp manifestations is observed all across the protectorate.
It will not be easy to cover the costs of moving. The old colony becomes the fief of the warp breach.

The psykers perish in their attempts to comprehend this menace, but the last of them manages to deliver a message before he is turned inside out: "The offering is accepted and reciprocated." Following the incident, an increase in the number of latent psykers and warp manifestations is observed across the protectorate.

Following the incident, an increase in the number of latent psykers and warp manifestations is observed across the protectorate.

Following the incident, an increase in the number of latent psykers and warp manifestations is observed across the protectorate.

The psykers perish in their attempts to comprehend this menace, but the last of them manages to deliver a message before he is turned inside out: "The offering is accepted and reciprocated." Following the incident, an increase in the number of latent psykers and warp manifestations is observed across the protectorate.

languages.text: Les psykers trouvent la mort en tentant de comprendre cette menace, mais le dernier d'entre eux parvient à transmettre un message avant de finir retourné comme un gant : « L'offrande est acceptée, et la pareille rendue. » À la suite de cet incident, on observe au sein du protectorat une nette augmentation du nombre de psykers potentiels et de manifestations du Warp.
languages.original_text: The psykers perish in their attempts to comprehend this menace, but the last of them manages to deliver a message before he is turned inside out: "The offering is accepted and reciprocated." Following the incident, an increase in the number of latent psykers and warp manifestations is observed across the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Les psykers trouvent la mort en tentant de comprendre cette menace, mais le dernier d'entre eux parvient à transmettre un message avant de finir retourné comme un gant : « L'offrande est acceptée, et la pareille rendue. » À la suite de cet incident, on observe au sein du protectorat une nette augmentation du nombre de psykers potentiels et de manifestations du Warp.

languages.text: 異能者たちはこの脅威を理解せんとして命を落としたが、最後の一人は体を裏返しにされる前にメッセージを伝えることに成功した。「捧げ物を受け入れ、それに応えよう」。この事件の後、保護領全域で異能者たちが潜伏し、〈歪み〉現象が増加した。
languages.original_text: The psykers perish in their attempts to comprehend this menace, but the last of them manages to deliver a message before he is turned inside out: "The offering is accepted and reciprocated." Following the incident, an increase in the number of latent psykers and warp manifestations is observed across the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: 異能者たちはこの脅威を理解せんとして命を落としたが、最後の一人は体を裏返しにされる前にメッセージを伝えることに成功した。「捧げ物を受け入れ、それに応えよう」。この事件の後、保護領全域で異能者たちが潜伏し、〈歪み〉現象が増加した。

languages.text: 众多灵能者试图理解这种威胁的本质，但所有人都在研究过程中丧生了。不过，最后一位灵能者在变成血肉模糊的肉块之前，成功地传回了这样的信息——“祭品已被接受，报偿已然返还。”这件事情发生之后，整个王朝的灵能者数量与亚空间异变都明显增加。
languages.original_text: The psykers perish in their attempts to comprehend this menace, but the last of them manages to deliver a message before he is turned inside out: "The offering is accepted and reciprocated." Following the incident, an increase in the number of latent psykers and warp manifestations is observed across the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: 众多灵能者试图理解这种威胁的本质，但所有人都在研究过程中丧生了。不过，最后一位灵能者在变成血肉模糊的肉块之前，成功地传回了这样的信息——“祭品已被接受，报偿已然返还。”这件事情发生之后，整个王朝的灵能者数量与亚空间异变都明显增加。

languages.text: Los psíquicos perecen en el intento de comprender la amenaza, pero el último logra enviar un mensaje antes de que sus entrañas salgan de su interior: «La oferta es aceptada y reciprocada». Tras el incidente, se observa un aumento de manifestaciones de disformidad y psíquicos latentes en todo el protectorado.
languages.original_text: The psykers perish in their attempts to comprehend this menace, but the last of them manages to deliver a message before he is turned inside out: "The offering is accepted and reciprocated." Following the incident, an increase in the number of latent psykers and warp manifestations is observed across the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Los psíquicos perecen en el intento de comprender la amenaza, pero el último logra enviar un mensaje antes de que sus entrañas salgan de su interior: «La oferta es aceptada y reciprocada». Tras el incidente, se observa un aumento de manifestaciones de disformidad y psíquicos latentes en todo el protectorado.

languages.text: Die Psioniker sterben bei ihrem Versuch, diese Gefahr zu begreifen, doch der letzte kann noch eine Botschaft hinterlassen, ehe sein Innerstes nach Außen gekrempelt wird: "Das Opfer wird akzeptiert und erwidert." Nach dem Vorfall ist im gesamten Protektorat ein Anstieg bei der Anzahl von latenten Psionikern und Warp-Manifestationen zu beobachten.
languages.original_text: The psykers perish in their attempts to comprehend this menace, but the last of them manages to deliver a message before he is turned inside out: "The offering is accepted and reciprocated." Following the incident, an increase in the number of latent psykers and warp manifestations is observed across the protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Die Psioniker sterben bei ihrem Versuch, diese Gefahr zu begreifen, doch der letzte kann noch eine Botschaft hinterlassen, ehe sein Innerstes nach Außen gekrempelt wird: "Das Opfer wird akzeptiert und erwidert." Nach dem Vorfall ist im gesamten Protektorat ein Anstieg bei der Anzahl von latenten Psionikern und Warp-Manifestationen zu beobachten.

languages.text: Ruhsezerler bu tehdidi anlamaya çalışırken can veriyor ancak içlerinden sonuncusu, içi dışına çıkarılmadan önce bir mesaj iletmeyi başarıyor: "Adak kabul edildi ve karşılığı verildi." Olayın ardından protektora genelinde gizli ruhsezerlerin ve öteboyut tezahürlerinin sayısında bir artış gözlemleniyor.
languages.original_text: The psykers perish in their attempts to comprehend this menace, but the last of them manages to deliver a message before he is turned inside out: "The offering is accepted and reciprocated." Following the incident, an increase in the number of latent psykers and warp manifestations is observed across the protectorate.
